mapper.select: SELECT vp.id as vpid , vp.title, vp.content as vcontent, vp.writer, vp.view_count, vp.created_date, vp.modified_date , u.id as uid, u.email, u.nickname, u.created_date as u_created_date, u.modified_date as u_modified_date, u.grade , c.id as cid, c.content as ccontent, c.writer as c_writer, c.created_date as c_created_date, c.modified_date as c_modified_date, c.post_id, c.comment_id FROM vip_post vp LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from comment) as c ON c.post_id = vp.id, user u WHERE vp.id=#{id} AND u.nickname = vp.writer;

SELECT vp.id as vpid , vp.title, vp.content as vcontent, vp.writer, vp.view_count, vp.created_date, vp.modified_date , u.id as uid, u.email, u.nickname, u.created_date as u_created_date, u.modified_date as u_modified_date, u.grade , c.id as cid, c.content as ccontent, c.writer as c_writer, c.created_date as c_created_date, c.modified_date as c_modified_date, c.post_id, c.comment_id FROM vip_post vp LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from comment) as c ON c.post_id = vp.id, user u WHERE u.nickname = vp.writer ;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO vip_post(title, content, writer, view_count, created_date, modified_date) VALUES(#{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{viewCount}, #{createdDate}, #{modifiedDate});
